string.name: name
string.value: The Kids That Became the Sun and the Moon
I heard there's a boy somewhere in Korean Folk Town that needs my help.

#b#p2071008##k is a boy that lives in Korean Folk Town with his mother and a little sister. He seemed to be in a hurry for something, so I asked him what's up, and he told me a story of what happened today. Apparently, his mother went out for a little bit, and while she was away from home, a tiger from the Black Mountain came to town and threatened to eat his sister and him. He said he has to leave town today before the tiger catches him tonight, and told me he needed #b20 #t4031268#s#k from #bHodori#k. And for reasons unknown, he also wanted me to get #b1 #t4031269##k that #r#o2230106##k gives.

#t4031268# #b#c4031268##k / 20
#t4031269# #b#c4031269##k / 1
#p2071008# from Korean Folk Town requested for 20 #t4031268#s and 1 #t4031269#. I got him the iterms, and he gave me #t4031270#.
Excuse me... please help me. \r\n#L0# #bI'm sorry, but I'm busy right now. \r\n#L1# How can I help you?
Before I tell you the story, please promise me that you'll help me. Will you?

My mother leaves home early in the morning to sell rice cake all day, but I'm terribly worried right now because she hasn't come home for days. Last night, however, I heard my mother arrive home and asked me to open the door. When I looked through the window, however, I did not see my mother's hand; rather, it was a furry, hairy paw of a tiger dressed up as my mother!

My sister and I delayed as much time as we possibly could by asking questions on everything, all the way until the early morning. When the morning came, the tiger realized our plan and decided to abandon its plan to act like our mother. The tiger left, but not before threatening us that it'll come back tonight to have us as its dinner.

I have talked to numerous people in this town about this, but they all seemed to be deathly afraid of tigers. My sister and I have had trouble falling asleep because of the tigers, but last night, when we finally fell asleep, the God of Providence appeared in our dreams and told us how to escape the tigers in detail.

But in order to escape that way, I'll need #b20 #t4031268#s#k and #b1 #t4031269##k, and I can't get them in town. Since you're fully on board to help me out, I'd really like you to get those items for me. I heard that #t4031268# can be found through #r#o5100003##k in Black Mountain, and #t4031269# can be found through #r#o2230106##k.
If you don't wish to help me, then there's no point of me telling you anything...
The sun is already setting. Did you get the items I asked you to get?

Thank you so much. My sister and I are now safe, thanks to you. My sister and I will now use this rope to climb all the way up to the sky. This oil is important in trying to block the tiger from chasing us. Again, thank you for your great help, and my sister and I will never forget you.
Didn't you get #b20 #t4031268#s#k and #b#t4031269##k? Please hurry; the sun is setting and the tiger will surely make its way here by dark.
